article.title: Boeing Receives More than $200 Million for P-8A System Development
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a $226,999,940 contract modification for services in support of the P-8A System Development and Demonstration Program for the T-1 and T-3 aircraft. This modification will support interim flight clearance for the P-8A aircraft in the special mission configuration. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
